eng: O God, the Great, the Eternal, who formed man in incorruption;
And death which entered into the world through the envy of the devil, You have destroyed by the life-giving manifestation of Your only-begotten Son, our Lord, God, and Savior Jesus Christ.
You have filled the earth with the heavenly peace, by which the hosts of angels glorify You saying "Glory to God in the highest, peace on earth, and good will towards men."
Pray for perfect peace, love, and the holy apostolic greetings.
According to Your good will, O God, fill our hearts with Your peace.
Cleanse us from all blemish, all guile, all hypocrisy, all craftiness, and the remembrance of vice bearing death.
And make us all worthy, O our Master, to greet one another with a holy kiss, that, without falling into condemnation, we may partake of Your immortal and heavenly gift in Christ Jesus our Lord.
